thread.title: Meet HTH Worldwide at the Agent@Home Travel Summit in Long Beach
thread.title_full: Meet HTH Worldwide at the Agent@Home Travel Summit in Long Beach

title: Meet HTH Worldwide at the Agent@Home Travel Summit in Long Beach
text:
Last updated: 05:00 PM ET, Fri September 04 2015 Meet HTH Worldwide at the Agent@Home Travel Summit in Long Beach Travel Agent | Claudette Covey | September 04, 2015 
HTH Worldwide has cemented a reputation for itself as a travel health insurance company that offers some of the most compelling and comprehensive medical benefits around the globe 
Agents will have the opportunity to learn about the myriad advantages the company can offer their clients during the Agent@Home Summit in Long Beach. “We are participating in the summit to present travel agents with a trip cancellation coverage option for their clients who also require travel medical benefits,” said Gina R. Clawson, a support specialist at HTH Worldwide.
